high_descs: Move to the basketball on the pet bed.
Pick up the basketball from the pet bed.
Bring the basketball to the lamp on the tall white dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Examine the basketball in the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Take a step forward to the cushion on the floor.
Pick the basketball up off the cushion.
Turn right and walk to the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a basketball by the illumination of a lamp.

high_descs: walk straight forward and face the basketball on your left
pick up the basketball off of the beanbag chair
turn right and walk to the white dresser at the end of the room
turn on the light on top of the dresser
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp while holding a basketball
